attributes.action: to amend the law so that child abusers and sex offenders are tried for all offences and  to amend the law so all prison sentences run consecutively ond not concurrently.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Every person in the world has a divine human right to feel safe and protected. If a life has been affected by the above then it is in the public interest that the perpetrator is sentenced to the maximum prison sentence and other offences should not be taken into consideration, so that the sentence runs concurrently. Each offence should have a seperate sentence imposed and all sentences should therfore run consectutively.
